channel.title: Make yourself/others staff [639]
channel.description: Ok, this is a Step by Step Tutorial: [b][size=11pt]Make Yourself Owner/Admin:[/size][/b] [b]go here: source\src\org\dementhium\net > ActionSender.java[/b] Search after: [b]if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase[/b] And you should find this: if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) <-Copy ''NAME'' that are already in here and press CTRL + H and replace all of the ''NAME''s to your own username player.getDefinition().setRights(2); <-- Depends on your server if 3 is Owner status or Owner is like admin status [b][size=11pt]Show you'r Status in-game (including Yell)[/size][/b] File Located here: [b]source\src\org\dementhium\model\player[/b] Open up [i][b]PlayerUpdate.java[/b][/i] and Search after: [b]else if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(" ")) {[/b] You should find something like this: [b] if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(" ")) { <--- insert your username here. appearanceData.writeRS2String("Owner "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername()));[/b] Now Save, Compile, and Tada, you will have status in-game and your own crown whit title. [u][i][b][TO TAKE UP ITEMS DO NOT USE CONSOLE USE NORMAL CHAT WHEN TAKING COMMANDS][/b][/i][/u] [i][b]Make other people staff:[/b][/i] Do the samme as you did whit yourself when making yourself owner but instead you will take a command in-game to give them rank and to give them yell fix it like you did whit you'r own.

item.title: Make yourself/others staff [639]
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

Ok, this is a Step by Step Tutorial:

[size=11pt]Make Yourself Owner/Admin:[/size]
go here: source\src\org\dementhium\net > ActionSender.java

Search after: if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase
And you should find this:
if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME”)) <-Copy ‘‘NAME’’ that are already in here and press CTRL + H and replace all of the '‘NAME’'s to your own username
player.getDefinition().setRights(2); <-- Depends on your server if 3 is Owner status or Owner is like admin status

[size=11pt]Show you’r Status in-game (including Yell)[/size]
File Located here: source\src\org\dementhium\model\player
Open up PlayerUpdate.java and Search after: else if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(" ")) {

You should find something like this:
if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(" “)) { <— insert your username here.
appearanceData.writeRS2String(”<img=1><col=cc0000>Owner "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername()));

Now Save, Compile, and Tada, you will have status in-game and your own crown whit title.

[TO TAKE UP ITEMS DO NOT USE CONSOLE USE NORMAL CHAT WHEN TAKING COMMANDS]

Make other people staff:
Do the samme as you did whit yourself when making yourself owner but instead you will take a command in-game to give them rank and to give them yell fix it like you did whit you’r own.

Read full topic
